scripts.dev: export UCLEARN_DEBUG=1 && run-s clean:dev dev:static dev:watchers
scripts.dev:static: cmd /C "mklink /J build src\static & mklink /J build\highlight.js node_modules\highlight.js\styles" && ls src/static/python-typeshed.zip || (cd node_modules/typeshed && bestzip ../../build/python-typeshed.zip ./stdlib/* ./stubs/* ./LICENSE --level 0 && cd ../..)
scripts.dev:css-watcher: bun onchange -i src/css/*.css -- bun run dev:css
scripts.dev:css: lightningcss --bundle src/css/index.css -o build/index.css && lightningcss --bundle src/css/ace-code-shadow.css -o build/ace-code-shadow.css
scripts.build: export UCLEARN_DEBUG=0 UCLEARN_DEBUG_FLAGS= && run-s clean:dev clean:build bundle build:scripts build:hydration-worker build:css
scripts.build:css: lightningcss --minify --bundle src/css/index.css -o dist/index.css && lightningcss --minify --bundle src/css/ace-code-shadow.css -o dist/ace-code-shadow.css
scripts.bundle: mkdir dist && cp -R src/static/* dist && rm dist/manifest.json dist/**/dev-* && mv dist/manifest.production.json dist/manifest.json && mkdir dist/highlight.js && cmd /C "xcopy /s node_modules\highlight.js\styles dist\highlight.js" && cd node_modules/typeshed && bestzip ../../dist/python-typeshed.zip ./stdlib/* ./stubs/* ./LICENSE --level 9 && cd ../..
scripts.clean:dev: (rm -r -f src/static/index.js src/static/python-stdlib.zip src/static/hydration-worker.js src/static/index.css src/static/ace-code-shadow.css || true) && cmd /C "rd src\static\highlight.js & rd build" || true
